## Description {#details}

A ConstantUser grouped with the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> adjustment.

The user will be adjusted by Offset.

Definition at line 206 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/constanthoisting-h">ConstantHoisting.h</a>.
